purpose: To provide a robust framework for creating complex AI motion behaviors in Godot games.
principle: Implements steering behaviors and algorithms to simulate realistic AI motion in game environments.
reusability: Designed as a plug-and-play solution for Godot projects, easily integrated into existing game code.
limitations: Primarily designed for the Godot engine, may not be easily adaptable to other game engines.
name: godot-steering-ai-framework
description: A complete framework for Godot to create beautiful and complex AI motion. Works both in 2D and in 3D.
highlight: Comprehensive AI motion framework for Godot supporting both 2D and 3D environments.
